tasks.name: Initialize Dashboard Project Structure
tasks.instructions:
Create a Next.js dashboard project with a liquid glass design system. Set up the directory structure, base components, and configuration files. The project should include:

1. Project configuration (package.json, tsconfig.json, next.config.js, etc.)
2. Base UI components (buttons, cards, inputs, etc. with the liquid glass styling)
3. Layout components (sidebar, header, main layout)
4. Theming system (light/dark mode support)

Implement the structure in /Users/karst/.openclaw/workspace/unified-dashboard/.
